about_the_game:
Continue your Snow Day adventure with a Season Pass for SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! which includes and all-new Game Mode, New Weapons, a Weapon Variation, and Cosmetic Packs.
 
This Season Pass includes 6 DLCs in total: 

  • All-new game mode

  • All-new ranged weapon and new cosmetics

  • All-new melee weapon and new cosmetics

  • New weapon variation for the Wand

  • CRED cosmetic pack

  • Asspen cosmetic pack
     

NICHOLE'S HOME BREW GAME MODE:  This all-new Game Mode changes the rules again! Prepare for hellish, new rules and special challenges that make Nichole’s “Infernal Pacts” feel like kindergarten recess:
The Board Girls have unleashed diabolical new Home Brew rules for Snow Day, featuring game-altering modes like The Floor is Lava, Air Superiority, and Super Pissed Off.

NEW WEAPONS: This season pass includes an all-new Ranged Weapon and an all-new Melee Weapon.
The Snowball is perfect for all those who mastered the other ranged weapons in the game. Unleash devastating new attacks on enemies and grant powerful supporting effects on your allies.

The Hammer: Stand firm against the darkness and assume the mantle of a Paladin to bring swift and glorious justice to the battlefield with the all-new Hammer melee weapon. Smite your enemies with ground-shattering attacks and protect your allies with powerful shields and buffs.
 
Each new weapon comes with six new upgrade cards and unique cosmetics.
 
NEW WEAPON VARIATION:
An all-new weapon variation of the Wand: the Ninja Star ranged weapon. It also includes three brand-new upgrade cards and new cosmetics.

COSMETICS PACKS: First up is the CRED Cosmetics Pack. A kid today is defined by their hydration drink – and their swag. Impress your friends and show the world how much CRED you have. The CRED Cosmetics pack gives you plenty of CRED with a fresh hairstyle, a CRED hoodie, and a cape. 

Get ready to hit the slopes with the Asspen Cosmetics Pack featuring iconic outfits from the season 6 episode, “Asspen.”

  • Ski Goggles

  • Fluffy Ear Muffs

  • Iconic Jester Hat

  • Puffy Jacket

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent depiction of fart clouds, feces, urine and other gross ways to use against enemies.
